title: Ranked Flex - Ranked S3 then moved to B3
body: Wow, I honestly can't believe you guys have done this. I 100% believe the approach should have been to give people the option to re-do there promos if they weren't happy with your old formula. My entire games thus far were against majority Gold and Platinum solo queue players and I still maintained a 60% win rate. I had to work hard in every game to ensure victory and how satisfying it was to play with and against players that actually knew what they were doing. Now I am back an entire tier from S3 where I was getting 27lp a win. To me this is massively unfair and I take it to heart as I was so happy to be placed in a decent starting position with a large LP gain.

replies.body: Wow. I actually have to explain how mmr works to you? i hope to god you arent getting paid for this.

If it was a hard reset as you seem to think it was then playing the same placements would have gotten us the same rank. Also, while I check boards regularly, if you want me to see your replies best to use the reply button.

That is so wrong Seras. No platinums got placed bronze you are wrong. And if they did they lost to bronzies. 

You completely fucked the pooch, and fixing it for platinum has broken it for bronze and silver, WHICH ARE THE MAJORITY OF YOUR PLAYERBASE.

I played same placements as a plat friend, I got G3 from G4, he got S1 from P1. We were vsing Silver-Diamonds. The matchmaking was completely broken and was unfair for everyone involved, 

There are posts here on boards about people Plat+ getting placed in Bronze. There are reddits posts about it as well.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks
From Silver 3 to Bronze 4 because of 1 match wont 8 out of 10 of my provisionals get one unlucky game and now im in bronze 4 great thanks riot

Bronze 4 is unlucky with a B1 ending rank, but maybe this will clarify a little:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks

You ended S6 in B2, so it looks like you were the ones the change actually fixed the issue (mostly) for. The matchmaking for placements originally was completely messed up, B5s getting placed in P1 and P1 gettign placed in B5. The change was intended to fix the ranking of those who got placed inaccurately (as typically you'd get placed a little lower than your end of season rank) and has certainly not quite worked as intended for some people, but your seeding at least appears to be fixed.

I know it feels unfair, but the placements were unfair for everybody (good unfair or bad unfair), and leaving Diamonds in Bronze and Bronzes in Plat was only going to destroy flex matchmaking moreso.
